Question
========

In an experiment, students with behavioral problems are randomly assigned to one of two conditions. The researchers would like to know which condition leads to better outcomes in terms of the number of conflicts reported, in which they control for the age of the students. 

Which of the analyses below best fits these objectives in answering their research question?
  
Answerlist
----------
* ANCOVA
* One-way ANOVA
* Two-way ANOVA
* Simple linear regression

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------
* Correct
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
